description:
Holder of the Devotion bead, Shino is one of three teenagers who survived the destruction of Ootsuka Village five years prior. He found himself near dying as his village burned, but chose life over death and now harbors the living spirit sword http://anidb.net/ch49445 [Murasame] in his arm. With Murasame comes the curse of not aging, which explains his looks.
He has a birthmark in the shape of a peony flower on his right arm. He feels a special attachment to his childhood friends http://anidb.net/ch49443 [Sousuke] and http://anidb.net/ch49444 [Hamaji], the other two survivors of Ootsuka Village.
name: Inuzuka Shino
